payment_will_be_processed: Your payment will start processing immediately and will be reflected in your account shortly upon confirmation.
qrcode_prompt: Place a SEEDS Payment QR Code inside the scan area

error_messages.unknown_try_again: An error happened while processing the barcode. Please ensure that you have authorized the application for Camera access and that you are scanning a valid SEEDS Payment QR code.

transaction.title: Securely sign to pay with Seeds
transaction.error: There was an error processing your payment, please try again.
